author: Maryse Zeidler
title: Garment-makers shift production to satisfy demand for reusable cloth face masks
description: As a seamstress who usually makes sparkly spandex-laced festival-wear, Nina Jones never thought one day she would aid in the fight against a global pandemic.
content:
As a seamstress who usually makes sparkly spandex-laced music festival attire, Nina Jones never thought one day she would aid in the fight against a global pandemic. 
But recently, the same purple tiger-print material Jones uses to make leggings has gone tow… [+4129 chars]
